name: Ratanhia
Relationship: Compare: PAEON.; CROTON (rectal neuralgia); SANGUIN. NIT. (diseases of rectum); MACUNA PRURENS - DOLICHOS - PILES, WITH burning; hemorrhoidal diathesis); SILICO-SULPHOCALCITE OF ALUMINA; SLAG - blast iron furnace cinder - (anal itching, piles, and constipation; housemaid's knee); abdominal flatulent distention and lumbago. Analogue to Lycopod.

Head: Sensation as if scalp from nose to vertex were stretched
Bursting in head after stool, and when sitting with head bent forward
Stomach: Pain like knives cutting the stomach
Rectum: Stools must be forced with great effort; protrusion of hemorrhoids
Fetid, thin diarrhoea; stools burn; burning pains before and after stools
Itching of anusgreat constriction of anus; stools forced with great effort
Fissure of anus, with great constriction, burning like fire, as do the hemorrhoids; temporarily relieved by cold water
Anus aches and burns for hours after stool
Dry heat at anus, with sudden knife-like stitches
Aches, as if full of broken glass

details: The rectal symptoms are most important, and have received much clinical confirmation. It has cured pterygium. VIOLENT HICCOUGH. Cracked nipples. (GRAPH.; EUP. AR.) PIN WORMS.
dosage: Third to sixth potency. Locally, the Cerate has proved invaluable in many rectal complaints.
